ValidationRule.description: Regulates changes made to inactive roles
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !Aim_to_Misbehave__c && !Active_Role__c && ( ISCHANGED(Resource__c) || ISCHANGED(SchedStartTime) || ISCHANGED(SchedEndTime) || ISCHANGED(Status) || ISCHANGED(Role_Not_Needed__c) || ISCHANGED(ServiceTerritoryId) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Scheduling related changes are only allowed for active roles.
